All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssetPool
Completely static class to get the assets.
Bounds
Class for the bounds of the objects
BoundsType
Just to differentiate between the box and triangle bounds
BoxBounds
Class for the bounds of a box(square) objects
Button
Abstract class of a button.
Camera
Every engine needs a camera! Important!
CameraControls
Class to control to camera movement
CircleBounds
Class for the circle bounds of an object.
CloseWindowButton
Class for the exit button inside main menu.
Coin
Class for the coin
Component<T>
Generic abstract class = any class can override this
Constants
Super helpful whenever you want to be tweaking values.
CreateNewLevelMenu
The scene where we create a new level, or where we type the level name to import it.
DataBaseHandler
Class that stores all the methods needed for a completely working database Global behaviour.
Direction
Enum for directions
GameObject
Core component for any engine
Grid
Contains the grid
Ground
Class for the ground component
InfoScene
Class for the level's info.
KeyListener
Takes care of the key events
Level1Menu
First Level Scene.
Level2Menu
Second Level Scene.
Level3Menu
Third Level Scene.
Level4Menu
Fourth Level Scene.
LevelEditorControls
Contains all the controls for the Level Editor
LevelEditorScene
This is the Editor Scene where we can create levels
LevelScene
This is the playable Level
Main
 
MainContainer
Stores all the blocks and objects (sprites) that can be placed in the game
MainMenuScene
This is the Main Menu
MenuItem
Contains each of the components attached to the main container
MouseListener
Extends Mouse adapter -> Window events registered, keeps track of mouse events
Music
Class for the music file
OptionSelectMenu
The scene where we select whether we want to create a new level, or to edit an existing one...
Pair
Encapsulates a pair of numbers (for position/ scale/ ...) (x, y)
ParallaxBG
Class for the Parallax-type Background.
Parser
Parses the json file.
PipePart
Class for the end-of-the-level pipe part
Player
Class for the player
PlayerState
Enum for the states of the player
Portal
Class for the Portal's properties
ProgressBar
Class for the progress bar
Renderer
Should take care of drawing objects relative to the camera or the zIndex
RigidBody
The way the player reacts to any physical constraints
RotateButton
Class for the rotate buttons inside level editor controls
SaveLevelButton
Class for the button that saves the edits made inside editor.
Scene
Abstract class that holds the methods that all the scenes will need
SceneChangerButton
Class for the scene changer button.
Serialize
Abstract class to serialize the objects.
Sprite
Component to add to any game object Contains a picture
SpriteSheet
Class that handles the sprite sheets
SubmitButton
Class for the submit button.
TabItem
Very similar to MenuItem class.
TextField
Class for the text field inside the option select menu (new level or play created).
Time
Used to get the current time
Transform
Holds information about of the object
TriangleBounds
Class for the spikes' bounds
Window
Implements runnable because it is easier to stop/start a thread than pausing an execution.
